title: Jeremy Hunt – 2013 Speech at the Policy Exchange
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of a speech made by the Secretary of State for Health, Jeremy Hunt, to the Policy Exchange on 16th January 2013.
content:
[![jeremyhunt](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/jeremyhunt.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/jeremyhunt.jpg)
